---
name: test-skill
description: A test skill for unit tests that validates the skill-builder functionality works correctly
---

# Test Skill

This is a valid test skill used for testing the skill-builder CLI.

## Usage

This skill is used in automated tests to verify that:
- SKILL.md parsing works correctly
- Frontmatter validation passes for valid skills
- Package creation works with proper skill structure

## Reference Documentation

See `references/example.md` for sample reference content.
